item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?

shorttext.p: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

shorttext.p: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

shorttext.p: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

item.title: Partners
item.description: When Marcus hires a recently paroled ex-convict to work in the office, Allen suspects the once-criminal to have ulterior motives. As Allen helps Ruth draw up a living will, Marcus grows jealous of his partner bonding with his mother.

shorttext.p: When Marcus hires a recently paroled ex-convict to work in the office, Allen suspects the once-criminal to have ulterior motives. As Allen helps Ruth draw up a living will, Marcus grows jealous of his partner bonding with his mother.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 4: Last Reasoning of Kings
item.description: When Babbit's past comes back to haunt him, Frank clashes with Charlie to protect his mentor and seeks medical answers. The community reels after losing a member, while new security measures affect the scientists' work.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 4: Last Reasoning of Kings

When Babbit's past comes back to haunt him, Frank clashes with Charlie to protect his mentor and seeks medical answers. The community reels after losing a member, while new security measures affect the scientists' work.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: Howard tries to do something special to celebrate the anniversary of his first date with Bernadette. Sheldon is conflicted when he makes a major scientific breakthrough but some details have to be corrected.

shorttext.p: Howard tries to do something special to celebrate the anniversary of his first date with Bernadette. Sheldon is conflicted when he makes a major scientific breakthrough but some details have to be corrected.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

shorttext.p: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: With the events of New York behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets. Aria is haunted by the recent past events, while Emily and Spencer try to wrap their head around the new normal.

shorttext.p: With the events of New York behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets. Aria is haunted by the recent past events, while Emily and Spencer try to wrap their head around the new normal.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change
item.description: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change

The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: As the wedding approaches, Barney and Robin deliberately ruin an obnoxious couple's evening, Marshall and Lily's plans for Italy hit a snag, Ted tells Lily that he's moving to Chicago, and the mother buys her ticket to Farhampton.

shorttext.p: As the wedding approaches, Barney and Robin deliberately ruin an obnoxious couple's evening, Marshall and Lily's plans for Italy hit a snag, Ted tells Lily that he's moving to Chicago, and the mother buys her ticket to Farhampton.

item.title: Intelligence
item.description: A CIA agent goes rogue with very important information from the CIA, which results in the death of a M.I 6 agent. When Gabriel is brought to the case they find out that Mei Chen is able to hack into his head.

shorttext.p: A CIA agent goes rogue with very important information from the CIA, which results in the death of a M.I 6 agent. When Gabriel is brought to the case they find out that Mei Chen is able to hack into his head.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

shorttext.p: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

item.title: The 100
item.description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

shorttext.p: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

shorttext.p: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

item.title: True Detective
item.description: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

shorttext.p: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

item.title: Glee
item.description: Nervous for opening night, Rachel is willing to do anything to succeed. When she finds out that Jacob Ben Isreal is writing a review of the show for the New Yorker, her director pressures her to do whatever it takes for a good review.

shorttext.p: Nervous for opening night, Rachel is willing to do anything to succeed. When she finds out that Jacob Ben Isreal is writing a review of the show for the New Yorker, her director pressures her to do whatever it takes for a good review.

item.title: The Following
item.description: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

shorttext.p: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

item.description: The Russian and US Presidents are set to sign an anti-terror treaty when assassinations rock Los Angeles, a call from a distressed Chloe forces Jack into action and President Logan's wife believes there may be a conspiracy.

shorttext.p: The Russian and US Presidents are set to sign an anti-terror treaty when assassinations rock Los Angeles, a call from a distressed Chloe forces Jack into action and President Logan's wife believes there may be a conspiracy.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

shorttext.p: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 5: The Wolf and the Lion
item.description: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at The Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 5: The Wolf and the Lion

Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at The Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

shorttext.p: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

item.title: House of Cards
item.description: Congressman Francis Underwood has been declined the chair for Secretary of State. He's now gathering his own team to plot his revenge. Zoe Barnes, a reporter for the Washington Herald, will do anything to get her big break.

shorttext.p: Congressman Francis Underwood has been declined the chair for Secretary of State. He's now gathering his own team to plot his revenge. Zoe Barnes, a reporter for the Washington Herald, will do anything to get her big break.

item.title: Extant
item.description: Astronaut Molly Woods returns to Earth after a 13 month solo mission aboard a space station. She's re-adjusting to life with husband John and their child Ethan, a robot they call their own as Molly is unable to conceive.

shorttext.p: Astronaut Molly Woods returns to Earth after a 13 month solo mission aboard a space station. She's re-adjusting to life with husband John and their child Ethan, a robot they call their own as Molly is unable to conceive.

item.title: Grimm
item.description: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

shorttext.p: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

item.title: Vikings
item.description: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

shorttext.p: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

item.title: Justified
item.description: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.

shorttext.p: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.

item.title: Defiance
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax
item.description: Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax

Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

item.title: Shameless
item.series: Season 4, Ep. 4: Strangers on a Train
item.description: Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. The situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able to hide just in time before her infidelity can be exposed.

shorttext.p: Season 4, Ep. 4: Strangers on a Train

Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. The situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able to hide just in time before her infidelity can be exposed.

item.title: Vikings
item.description: Ragnar returns to England this time with Earl Haraldson's permission on condition that he includes Knut as part of the crew. On arrival, they are met by armed troops and Ragnar is inclined to accept their offer to accompany them.

shorttext.p: Ragnar returns to England this time with Earl Haraldson's permission on condition that he includes Knut as part of the crew. On arrival, they are met by armed troops and Ragnar is inclined to accept their offer to accompany them.
